tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QRCodeTransactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  qrcode_data TEXT,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL,
  user_id INT,
  INDEX idx_qrcode_data(qrcode_data),
  INDEX idx_transaction_date(transaction_date)
)

CREATE TABLE qr_code_indexes (
  index_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
  INDEX qr_code_index (qr_code),
  INDEX transaction_id_index (transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE qr_code_transactions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX qr_code_idx (qr_code)
);

CREATE TABLE qr_code_users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  user_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  INDEX user_name_idx (user_name)
);

CREATE TABLE qr_code_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX log_date_idx (log_date)
);

CREATE TABLE qr_code_transactions (
  id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code_id VARCHAR(255),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX qr_code_idx (qr_code_id)
)

CREATE TABLE qr_code_users (
  user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code_id VARCHAR(255),
  user_name VARCHAR(50),
  user_email VARCHAR(100),
  INDEX user_idx (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE qr_code_locations (
  location_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code_id VARCHAR(255),
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  location_address VARCHAR(255),
  INDEX location_idx (location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE qr_code_products (
  product_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  qr_code_id VARCHAR(255),
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  INDEX product_idx (product_id)
)

CREATE TABLE QRCodePayments (
  payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
